attributes.action: demand the resignation of every MP who has exploited expenses for personal benefit, as an outrageous abuse of public money.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I want MPs to be accountable for their outrageous exploitation of expenses for personal benefit.  Not to talk about "lessons learned", not to talk about rule changes, but to be held personally accountability for their behaviours, which would not be tolerated by any other members of the public.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
